subject: Re: Drone Demo
body:
You don't often get email from david.johnson@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Sgt. Williams,

It's nice to meet you virtually.

I wanted to ask if you'd be willing to set up a demo call of our Aerodome product offerings.  We just received clearance from the FDA  for a few exciting changes and are first in the country to do so.

I have attached a quick PDF, but would like to set up a call with the CEO of Aerodome who stayed on after Flock Safety acquired the company.  Do you have any availability next week?

Thanks  <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/8169f0b9-b809-44d1-bd53-b924701f24a2.gif> 

On Tue, Feb 4, 2025 at 4:12?PM AUSTIN Brian <baustin@springfield-or.gov baustin@springfield-or.gov > wrote:


	Kyle,

	 

	During our recent meeting with Flock for the LPR technology both of our departments are currently looking into, we got to talking about Flock�s recent acquisition of Aerodome and I mentioned our current Metro Drone Team and DFR program. David was interested in getting connected with you at some point to possibly discuss their products. I told him I would make the connection as he has been great about working with us on the plan for LPR stuff. 

	 

	 http://springfield-or.gov/ 

	 

	From: David Johnson <david.johnson@flocksafety.com david.johnson@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Friday, January 31, 2025 5:38 PM
	To: AUSTIN Brian <baustin@springfield-or.gov baustin@springfield-or.gov >
	Subject: Drone Demo

	 

	**| WARNING: This email originated from outside of your organization. Please do not click on links or open attachments unless you know the content is safe. |** 

	Brian,
	
	Can you help set up a meeting with the officer that is the head of the drone program we discussed at the meeting a few weeks ago?
	
	I'd love to set up a full flight demo onsite with you and the team that are involved in drones.
	
	Thanks 

	 

	-- 

	
David Johnson
Regional Account Executive I

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/b8855938-244c-467f-b2cb-0cca0fd1a45c/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/b8855938-244c-467f-b2cb-0cca0fd1a45c/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGMYLDMVRG633LFZRW63JPMZWG6Y3LONQWMZLUPE======/MZRWCNBYGE4DSYZXGY3TIMBUG43GMZJZGJSWMYLDMFRTMZBSME2TGNBSGRRTGNRZ/www-facebook-com-flocksafety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/b8855938-244c-467f-b2cb-0cca0fd1a45c/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XHS33VOR2WEZJOMNXW2L3DF5DGY33DNNJWCZTFOR4Q====/GUYWIZBZMVRWMNBSGQ3WGMJZGZTDAZRUG5TDGNTFGMYDMNZXG5SGGNZYHAYTINBT/www-youtube-com-c-flocksafety
